original_title: My Little Poney Friendship Is Magic: Ponies On The Move
overview: All our pony friends are out and about discovering a world filled with friendship, laughter and fun. Camping trips, family reunions and adventures at the Wonderbolt Academy are all on the itinerary as Twilight Sparkle and her five fabulous friends see the world in a whole new way and also deal with scary stories, a reckless Pegasus, and that notorious trouble-maker Trixie.
title: My Little Poney Friendship Is Magic: Ponies On The Move
